segments.text: Is there anything I can do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I am thinking of a tour to Australia .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I recommend the popular route ? It's a seven days ' trip and cost $ 500 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's really cheap . What are the fees included ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Everything , sir , including the air tickets , accommodation and gate tickets .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I will take the tour .
segments.speaker: S2
